entry.title: Animating a map of Covid in the Northeast US
entry.summary: I recently put together a short animation showing the spread of Covid throughout the Northeast United States: I thought it might be interesting to walk through the process I used to create the video. The steps described in this article aren’t exactly what I used (I was dealing with data in a PostGIS database, and in the interests of simplicity I wanted instructions that can be accomplished with just QGIS), but they end up in the same place.
